articles.title: Rangers 3-0 Union Saint-Gilloise (agg 3-2): Gers overcome two-goal deficit in Champions League win - Daily Mail
articles.description: STEPHEN McGOWAN AT IBROX: On another pulsating European night at Ibrox Malik Tillman's first goal for the club came with both immaculate timing and a slice of history.
articles.content: Never before had Rangers overcome a two-goal first leg defeat to progress in a UEFA competition. On another pulsating European night at Ibrox Malik Tillmans first goal for the club came with both imm… [+7978 chars]

articles.author: India.com Lifestyle Staff
articles.title: Monkeypox A.2 Strain in India: How is it Different From B.1 Strain? All You Need to Know - India.com
articles.description: The current outbreak of the Monkeypox virus in Europe is driven by the B.1 strain. Notably, the A.2 strain is quite different from the former strain.
articles.content: The viral zoonosis infection, Monkeypox, is slowly spreading across India and so far, the country has reported 9 cases and 1 death. The Centre has stepped up vigil and issued revised guidelines. The … [+3209 chars]
